name: iQQ Default Client (CLI001)

values.description: Base API URL (without version). Version is specified in request path (e.g., /v1/package)
Default Client - Maps to CLI001. Get from AWS Secrets Manager: iqq-dev-cognito-client-default
Get from AWS Secrets Manager: iqq-dev-cognito-client-default
Default API Key - Tagged with clientId=CLI001. Get from AWS Secrets Manager: iqq-dev-api-key-default
Business Client ID (automatically extracted from API key)
OAuth access token (automatically set after authentication)
Current API version to use (v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6, v7, v8, v9)

description:
Default client environment with CLI001 preferences and versioning support.

Client Preferences (CLI001):
- Blocks APCO Insurance
- Max 2 providers
- Expected result: 2 quotes (Client Direct, Route66)

API Versions:
- v1: Stable (production)
- v2-v9: Testing/planned

Setup Instructions:
1. Get credentials from AWS Secrets Manager:
   - iqq-dev-cognito-client-default (client_id, client_secret)
   - iqq-dev-api-key-default (api_key)
2. Replace YOUR_CLIENT_ID, YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET, YOUR_API_KEY
3. Run 'Get OAuth Token' to authenticate
4. Test endpoints with different versions

IMPORTANT: This is a template file. Copy and fill in your credentials.
